channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Parents worried about their children's screentime: put your phone down
item.description: Parents who want their kids to cut back on screen time might want to get a handle on their own by designating specific parameters for their devices.

item.title: What's behind your phone cravings and how movement can replace them
item.description: Breaking your scrolling habit could help you feel calmer, happier, and more energized. NPR's Life Kit explains how to get there.

item.title: Journalists Shed Light on Opioid Settlement Cash, New Medicaid Work Requirements
